homepage_intro: Welcome to Nydalen International Highschool, where excellence meets innovation.
about_us_paragraph1: Nydalen International Highschool is committed to academic excellence, character development, and global citizenship.
about_us_paragraph2: We offer a dynamic learning environment enriched by international perspectives.
about_us_paragraph3: To empower students to become compassionate, lifelong learners and responsible global citizens.
contact_us_paragraph1: Have any questions? We'd love to hear from you.
contact_us_paragraph2: Reach out via our contact form or call our office for more information.
privacy_policy: Your privacy is important to us. We do not share your personal data with third parties.
terms_of_service: By accessing this site, you agree to our terms including cookie usage, data handling, and user conduct.
